abilities.name: Core Guard
abilities.effect: As long as Starmie has any Psychic Energy attached to it, damage done to Starmie by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Energy Flip
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) You may move an Energy attached to that Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
